original_body_lines: Sri Lanka welcomes Air China at the Bandaranaike International Airport (BIA) on July 3, Airport and Aviation Services (Sri Lanka) (Private) Limited (AASL) said.
They said three weekly flights between Chengdu and Colombo will be operated.
Accordingly, flights are scheduled to operate between Sichuan and Colombo on Mondays, Wednesdays and Fridays. (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
